amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this division to be used to carry out the Bicycle Subsidy Benefit Program of the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
